alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Livingston; Ontario (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:52PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Livingston, northeastern Allegany and southwestern Ontario Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 850 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strengthening thunderstorms over the area, with the strongest storm near Letchworth State Park. The storms are moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Geneseo, Dansville, Letchworth State Park, Avon, Mount Morris, Conesus, Bristol, Lima, Naples, Hemlock, Honeoye, York, Groveland, Springwater, Canadice, Livonia, Nunda, Ossian, Canaseraga and Leicester. This includes Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning may occur with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
